query.statement:
SELECT A.PJT ,A.HNO ,A.BSU ,A.TGB ,A.GND ,ZLCD4.CTEXT2 AS GND_NM ,A.BGT ,A.BMT ,A.BST ,A.JBF ,A.RMK ,A.ISD ,A.SPT ,A.NAM ,A.ZMUSAOCNT ,A.ZMUSAUCNT ,A.ZMUSAOCNT2 ,A.ZMUSAUCNT2 ,A.VKGRP ,ZLCD2.CTEXT2 AS VKGRP_NM ,A.VKBUR ,ZLCD3.CTEXT2 AS VKBUR_NM ,A.ABR_NM ,A.BSU_GB ,CASE WHEN A.BSU_GB = '1' THEN 'Á÷¿µ' ELSE 'Çù·Â' END BSU_GB_NM ,ZLCD1.CTEXT2 AS ABG_NM FROM ( SELECT CS116.MANDT ,CS116.CS116_PJT AS PJT ,CS116.CS116_HNO AS HNO ,CS116.CS116_BSU AS BSU ,CS116.CS116_TGB AS TGB ,CS116.CS116_GND AS GND ,CS116.CS116_BGT AS BGT ,CS116.CS116_BMT AS BMT ,CS116.CS116_BST AS BST ,CS116.CS116_JBF AS JBF ,CS116.CS116_RMK AS RMK ,CS101.CS101_ISD AS ISD ,CS111.ABG ,ZMS02.ZMUSAOCNT ,ZMS02.ZMUSAUCNT ,ZMS02.ZMUSAOCNT2 ,ZMS02.ZMUSAUCNT2 ,ZMS01.ZSITE_NM AS SPT ,ZMS01.KUNNR_NM AS NAM ,WB010.VKGRP ,SUBSTR(WB010.VKGRP,1,2)||'00' AS VKBUR ,WB010.ABR_NM ,WB010.BSU_GB
FROM SAPHEE.ZCST116 AS CS116 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST111 AS CS111 ON CS111.MANDT = CS116.MANDT AND CS111.PJT = CS116.CS116_PJT AND CS111.HNO = CS116.CS116_HNO
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST101 AS CS101 ON CS101.MANDT = CS116.MANDT AND CS101.CS101_PJT = CS116.CS116_PJT AND CS101.CS101_HNO = CS116.CS116_HNO
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS ZMS02 ON ZMS02.MANDT = CS116.MANDT AND ZMS02.POSID = CS116.CS116_PJT AND ZMS02.POSID_1 = CS116.CS116_PJT||CS116.CS116_HNO
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS ZMS01 ON ZMS01.MANDT = CS116.MANDT AND ZMS01.POSID = CS116.CS116_PJT
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZWBT010 AS WB010 ON WB010.MANDT = CS116.MANDT AND WB010.LGORT = CS116.CS116_BSU
WHERE CS116.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND CS116_PST = 'A6' AND CS116_BGT BETWEEN #DAT1# AND #DAT2# AND CS116_BST BETWEEN #DAT3# AND #DAT4#
AND CS116.CS116_TGB = #GBU#
AND CS116.CS116_GND = #GND#
AND CS116.CS116_PJT = #PJT#
AND CS116.CS116_ARA = #ARA#
AND CS116.CS116_BSU = #BSU#
AND CS116.CS116_BPM = #BPM#
AND WB010.VKGRP = #TEM#
/*
AND SUBSTR(WB010.VKGRP,1,2)||'00' = #DEP#
*/
AND SUBSTR(WB010.VKGRP,1,2) = #DPT#
) AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE ZLCD1 ON ZLCD1.MANDT = A.MANDT AND ZLCD1.CODE1 = 'CS112' AND ZLCD1.CODE2 = A.ABG AND ZLCD1.LANG = 'ko'
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE ZLCD2 ON ZLCD2.MANDT = A.MANDT AND ZLCD2.CODE1 = 'VKGRP' AND ZLCD2.CODE2 = A.VKGRP AND ZLCD2.LANG = 'ko'
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE ZLCD3 ON ZLCD3.MANDT = A.MANDT AND ZLCD3.CODE1 = 'VKBUR' AND ZLCD3.CODE2 = A.VKBUR AND ZLCD3.LANG = 'ko'
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE ZLCD4 ON ZLCD4.MANDT = A.MANDT AND ZLCD4.CODE1 = 'CS119' AND ZLCD4.CODE2 = A.GND AND ZLCD4.LANG = 'ko'
WITH UR
